```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dslabs)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
gap2011 <- gapminder %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  filter(year == 2011)
```

## Life Expectancy

```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = gap2011) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = gdp, y = life_expectancy, color = continent, size = population))
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(data = gap2011) +
  geom_col(aes(x = continent, y = life_expectancy, fill = continent))
```
